short_summary: Bid for construction services for wharf replacement
description: A procurement notice in which Public Works and Government Services Canada has amended a previous notice to extend the bidding window.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Summary

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites contractors to bid on a tender for the replacement of a cribwork wharf at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.

#### Tender Details

| Category | Details |
|---|---|
| **Solicitation ID** | WS3674443668 |
| **Reference Number** | WS3674443668-Doc3676452463 |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal (RFP) |
| **Procurement Category** | Construction Services (CNST) |
| **Trade Agreements** | Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement. |
| **Regions of Opportunity** | Halifax Harbour |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| **Contracting Address** | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada |
| **End User Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| **End User Address** | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada |
| **Tender Closing Date** | April 28, 2023, at 14:00 EST |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | October 21, 2022 |
| **Contact Information** | Carlos Castillo Nieto, carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca |
| **RFP Document** | Available on Ariba Discovery |

[View RFP Document {http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14168447}] 

The replacement of the existing cribwork wharf is a critical maintenance project for the Bedford Institute of Oceanography. Contractors are requested to submit a full and complete quotation meeting the specifications outlined in the tender document. It is the bidder's responsibility to review and understand all specifications and requirements prior to submitting their proposal.

#### Additional Information

*   This tender is open
